prompts: Create a fossil Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with a hard shell and sharp claws.
Imagine a water-type Pokemon with a sleek design and a unique shell that protects it from predators.
Generate a rock-type Pokemon with a round body and distinctive eyes, perfect for blending into rocky environments.
Show me a fossil Pokemon that has a brown and black color scheme, showcasing its ancient origins.
Design a Pokemon that evolves from a small aquatic creature into a larger prehistoric beast.
Give me a Pokemon that features a hard outer shell and two prominent, claw-like appendages.
Make a Pokemon inspired by ancient sea life, with colors and features that reflect its underwater habitat.
